entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, New Tecumseth
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
